medical_history.chief_complaint: Respiratory failure due to hypoxemia caused by rhinovirus with pneumonia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days prior to presentation with progressive cough and nasal congestion. The infant had decreased interest in nursing but continued producing the same number of wet diapers. On reexamination, the infant became more lethargic with a witnessed apneic episode and significant oxygen desaturation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previously healthy, full-term infant. No prior medical conditions specified.
